Welcome to Coinz 


 The goal of Coinz is to get as much GOLD as possible.
Coinz are positioned all around George Square, in order to collect them you have to walk to its location in the real world! Walking near a coin will activate your coin magnet that scoops up any coins within 25m of you. You can see the location of coinz on the map screen. New coinz are added each day and the previous day's removed so be quick!

The coinz you collect are stored in your wallet. There are 4 different types of coin you will pick up: PENY, QUID, DOLR and SHIL. Once coins are in your wallet, you can trade them with other players or exchange them with the bank.


By submitting coinz to the bank you get GOLD in return, GOLD represents you score and cannot be deposited or traded. The value of each coin in GOLD change as players deposit into the bank meaning that if everyone puts in one type of coin, it's value will fall meaning you get less GOLD for the same amount of coinz! It's up to you to figure out when the best time to deposit is.

You can compare your performance with other player using the Community Tab, as well as your friends! Find friends by searching their display name or email they used to sign up to coinz.
